1.content: Update subscription logic to 3-day cycles with 50 questions per subject
1.details: 1. Modify useSubscription.ts to track 3-day cycles instead of monthly limits. 2. Update question counting logic to reset every 3 days. 3. Implement free first set (50 questions) per subject logic. 4. Update checkQuestionAccess() function for new cycle-based system.

2.content: Update all UI text to reflect new subscription model
2.details: 1. Update dashboard to show '50 questions every 3 days per subject'. 2. Update subject pages with new messaging. 3. Update PaywallModal and SubscriptionBadge components. 4. Update pricing and subscription description text. 5. Update all references from '20 questions' to '50 questions every 3 days'.

3.details: Deploy the updated app with new subscription model and verify all changes are working correctly.
